TextView.android:text: This app was made with the idea of a TCPTest application with a slider to send commands to, for example, an arduino with a servo translating numbers into positions, but it doesn't have to be an arduino it could be used to only test if a port is open correctly or another version to be used as a chat, the original application was created by Gene Knott and was called TCPTest, created in Virtual Basic Studio for Virtual Basic. I believe I have reached my goal.
